str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A dwelling; by implication, a family.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.
A dwelling; by implication, a family.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: From kata and echo; to hold down, in various applications.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From pas and a derivative of rheo; all out-spokenness, i.e. Frankness, bluntness, publicity; by implication, assurance.
And, even, also, namely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A boasting; a ground of boasting (glorying, exultation). From kauchaomai; a boast in a good or a bad sense.
